column5: Mid-July my bride and I will be making a trek from Saskatoon to Hamilton, I was wondering if anyone knows of camps/lodges that would rent a boat for a day in the area from Thunder Bay to Sudbury. We are not taking Hwy 11, but going down past Chapleau area.

You could check out Moosehorn Lodge in Chapleau.  Nice cabins on a nice little lake with decent fishing.  Wawa area has a bunch of lodges that I'm sure could accommodate you.  I don't have experience with any of them but it's a fishy area - check out Whitefish lodge.
Stop in the Sault and book a day with Tyler Dunn.   Get out on the St.Marys.
